thread.title: Man arrested in connection with Manitoba Sports Hall of Fame theft
thread.title_full: Man arrested in connection with Manitoba Sports Hall of Fame theft

author: cbc
title: Man arrested in connection with Manitoba Sports Hall of Fame theft
text:
Winnipeg police have arrested a 54-year-old man after a large quantity of sports memorabilia was stolen from the Manitoba Sports Hall of Fame on Monday.
The break-in occurred at about 2:30 a.m., police say.
Detectives identified the suspect on Wednesday and police asked the public for help locating the man. Police said later on Wednesday he had been arrested.
